data.title: Recognition Events
data.meta_description: As part of this “Month of Recognition,” DHS employees are being honored during recognition events in communities across the country.
data.text:
As part of this “Month of Recognition,” recipients of DHS Secretary’s Awards are being honored during regional awards ceremonies and recognition events in communities across the country.

2022 Secretary's Awards - National Capital Region Ceremony - ICE Headquarters

Hosted by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) in Washington, DC on June 16, 2022.

2022 Secretary's Awards - South Regional Ceremony

Hosted by FEMA Region 6 in Denton, TX on May 19, 2022

2022 Secretary's Awards - West Regional Ceremony

Hosted by U.S. Coast Guard Air Station San Diego in San Diego, CA on April 29, 2022.

2022 Secretary's Awards - Northwest Regional Ceremony

Hosted by U.S. Coast Guard Air Station Seattle in Seattle, WA on April 28, 2022.

2022 Secretary's Awards - Southeastern Regional Ceremony

Hosted by U.S. Coast Guard Air Station Miami in Miami, FL on April 13, 2022.

2021 DHS Combined Federal Campaign Awards Ceremony - 2021 Season

On April 11, 2022, Deputy Secretary John Tien hosted the DHS Combined Federal Campaign (CFC) Awards Ceremony for the 2021 Season at DHS Headquarters in Washington, DC.

View photos from the CFC event

2022 Secretary's Awards - Northeastern Regional Ceremony

Hosted by US Citizenship and Immigration Services in Burlington, VT on April 8, 2022.
